snippet: Doug Elkins’s “Mo(or)town/Redux,” which retells “Othello” by way of Motown numbers, shows his multifaceted way with popular dancing.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews double bill of works by choreographer Doug Elkins, including premiere of dance piece Mo(or)town/Redux, at Baryshnikov Arts Center.
lead_paragraph: Doug Elkins’s “Mo(or)town/Redux,” which retells “Othello” by way of Motown numbers, shows his multifaceted way with popular dancing.

headline.seo: Doug Elkins’s ‘Mo(or)town/Redux’ and ‘Scott, Queen of Marys’
headline.main: Wearing His Heart on His Handkerchief
headline.print_headline: Wearing His Heart On His Handkerchief
